SELECT TI.TOUR_CODE AS tourCode, TI.TOUR_NAME AS tourName, TI.DEP_DAY AS depDay, TI.TOUR_DAYS AS tourIntDays, TI.BASE_PRICE AS basePrice, AR.ARR_NAME AS arrName, DP.DEP_NAME AS depName FROM (((TOURINFO TI LEFT JOIN DEPARTURE DP ON TI.DEP_CODE = DP.DEP_CODE) LEFT JOIN ARRIVAL AR ON TI.ARR_CODE = AR.ARR_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RE.TOUR_CODE AS RESULT_TOUR_CODE, SUM(RE.ADULT_COUNT + RE.CHILD_COUNT) AS RESERVE_COUNT FROM RESERVE RE GROUP BY RE.TOUR_CODE ) ON TI.TOUR_CODE = RESULT_TOUR_CODE) WHERE ( (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RESERVE RE WHERE RE.TOUR_CODE = TI.TOUR_CODE AND
(RE.ADULT_COUNT + RE.CHILD_COUNT + #adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#) <= TI.AVA_REC_MAX
) ) OR (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RESERVE RE WHERE RE.TOUR_CODE = TI.TOUR_CODE ) ) ) AND TI.DEP_DAY = TO_DATE(#depDayCondition#,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TI.DEP_CODE = #depCodeCondition# AND TI.ARR_CODE = #arrCodeCondition#
TI.TOUR_DAYS <= #tourDays#
TI.BASE_PRICE <= #basePrice#
ORDER BY TI.TOUR_DAYS DESC, TI.BASE_PRICE DESC

(RE.ADULT_COUNT + RE.CHILD_COUNT + #adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#) <= TI.AVA_REC_MAX
) ) OR (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RESERVE RE WHERE RE.TOUR_CODE = TI.TOUR_CODE ) ) ) AND TI.DEP_DAY = TO_DATE(#depDayCondition#,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TI.DEP_CODE = #depCodeCondition# AND TI.ARR_CODE = #arrCodeCondition#
TI.TOUR_DAYS <= #tourDays#
TI.BASE_PRICE <= #basePrice#

SELECT TOURINFO.TOUR_CODE AS tourCode, TOURINFO.TOUR_NAME AS tourName, TOURINFO.DEP_DAY AS depDay, TOURINFO.TOUR_DAYS AS tourIntDays, TOURINFO.BASE_PRICE AS basePrice, ARRIVAL.ARR_NAME AS arrName, DEPARTURE.DEP_NAME AS depName FROM ((( TOURINFO LEFT JOIN DEPARTURE ON TOURINFO.DEP_CODE = DEPARTURE.DEP_CODE) LEFT JOIN ARRIVAL ON TOURINFO.ARR_CODE = ARRIVAL.ARR_CODE) RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RESULT_TOUR_CODE, SUM(RESERVE.ADULT_COUNT + CHILD_COUNT) AS RESERVE_COUNT FROM ( RESERVE RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TOURINFO.TOUR_CODE AS RESULT_TOUR_CODE FROM TOURINFO WHERE TOURINFO.DEP_CODE = #depCodeCondition# AND TOURINFO.ARR_CODE = #arrCodeCondition# AND TOURINFO.DEP_DAY = TO_DATE(#depDayCondition#)
TOURINFO.TOUR_DAYS <= #tourDays#
TOURINFO.BASE_PRICE <= #basePrice#
) ON RESERVE.TOUR_CODE = RESULT_TOUR_CODE) GROUP BY RESULT_TOUR_CODE) ON TOURINFO.TOUR_CODE = RESULT_TOUR_CODE) WHERE TOURINFO.AVA_REC_MAX >= (RESERVE_COUNT + #adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#) OR (RESERVE_COUNT IS NULL AND TOURINFO.AVA_REC_MAX >= (#adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#)) ORDER BY TOURINFO.TOUR_DAYS DESC, TOURINFO.BASE_PRICE DESC

TOURINFO.TOUR_DAYS <= #tourDays#
TOURINFO.BASE_PRICE <= #basePrice#
) ON RESERVE.TOUR_CODE = RESULT_TOUR_CODE) GROUP BY RESULT_TOUR_CODE) ON TOURINFO.TOUR_CODE = RESULT_TOUR_CODE) WHERE TOURINFO.AVA_REC_MAX >= (RESERVE_COUNT + #adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#) OR (RESERVE_COUNT IS NULL AND TOURINFO.AVA_REC_MAX >= (#adultCountCondition# + #childCountCondition#))
